column2: Heavy Armour. While worn, provides ~LargeDamResBonus~ damage resistance versus ~WeaponType~. Gives a ~LargeSkillPen~ to all dex based skill checks and reduces your speed by ~HighSpeedReduce~.
column3: Heavy Armour. While worn, provides ~LargeDamResBonus~ damage resistance versus ~WeaponType~. Gives a ~MediumSkillPen~ to all dex based skill checks and reduces your speed by ~LowSpeedReduce~.
column4: Light Armour. While worn, provides ~SmallDamResBonus~ damage resistance versus ~WeaponType~. Gives a ~SmallSkillPen~ to all dex based skill checks.
column5: Medium Armour. While worn, provides ~MediumDamResBonus~ damage resistance versus ~WeaponType~. Gives a ~MediumSkillPen~ to all dex based skill checks. ~ArmourSpecialBuff~

column4: Ejection: can remove armour as a full round action.
